dublin_core.dcvalue: The Australian International COVID-19 Vaccination Certificate (ICVC) meets the global standard specified by the ICAO and endorsed by the WHO. The certificate uses Visible Digital Seal (VDS) technology in the form of a QR code that is secure as a passport chip and can be digitally authenticated in the same way as a passport. The QR code can be read at borders globally and by travel apps such as the IATA Travel Pass that many airlines use.

Submitted by Akshita Palliwal (palliwala@who.int) on 2022-02-25T11:47:35Z No. of bitstreams: 2 20211128_Australia's COVID-19 Certificate using VDS-NC OECD Deck_Webinar.pdf: 4082698 bytes, checksum: 9776b7b4d6e02c15b4591863cc2fc9d0 (MD5) 20211015_COVID-19 approved rapid antigen self tests_Australian Government.pdf: 90105 bytes, checksum: 090053e72588c1c528d5c7b698b137a0 (MD5)

Australia's International COVID-19 Vaccination Certificate using Visible Digital Seal Technology
